alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Charlotte; Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 2:36AM EST until January 11 at 1:54PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Pigg River Near Pigg River affecting Pittsylvania County. Roanoke (Staunton) River At Brookneal affecting Campbell, Charlotte and Halifax Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia... Roanoke River At Roanoke affecting Roanoke, City of Roanoke and City of Salem independent cities. Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Charlotte and Halifax Counties. For the Roanoke River...including Roanoke, Pigg River, Brookneal, Randolph...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Roanoke (Staunton) River at Brookneal. * WHEN...Until THURSDAY. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Brookneal Fish Hatchery pond furthest downstream begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 27.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 22.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:45 AM EST Wednesday was 27.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 28.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 26.9 feet on 01/17/1924. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 215 PM EST.
